Perceptor/Kup/Windlord:

=93I have an idea to let our friends escape BlackF=
ortress area... and PErhaps reboot Nightlight, alltough i dont know how muc=
h of her former self is retained=94said  Perceptor to Rodimus in a heavely =
encripted message=94But we have to let Tucson know, what Legacy=92s sittuat=
ion really is and this has been an unfortunate misunderstanding... That he=
=92s loyal to us... so far I watched... =94
************

Kup and Talon rem=
ained quiet but they lay down their weapons ready when  chances appear to s=
trike back.
****************
Windlord cursed while he used his beak and cra=
ws to kill spiders=93We must left this place NOW!!!!!=94 said annoyed


***=
************

Windlor cursed while 

From: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Friday, Ja=
nuary 21, 2011 1:47 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Wicked Blad=
es in the Dark!!




Near to the Black Tower:

As Tuscon and the rest lay d=
own their weapons, the other soldiers move to encircle the Maximals and the=
 Autobots. Insecticon, Bruticus-X, and Iguanus moved in almost eagerly to p=
ick up the mighty weapons that Tuscon has dropped, while Inferno, the self =
proclaimed bodyguard of Hydras watched Tuscon carefully, his optic ready to=
 spot treachery.

Quietly a short message is sent to Tuscon, =93Tuscon.=94 =
The deep voice of Noctorro, the leader of the Maximal Fuzors can be heard, =
=93My team is here. Rodimus sent us to aid you. None too soon it would seem=
.=94 Noctorro=92s words are grim, a soldier=92s humor in them. =93We await =
your signal.=94

At the same time Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quic=
kstrike move to do the same with Kup, Nightshift, Straightshot, Talon and t=
he others. Skyshadow, the leader of the Predacon Fuzors just watches with a=
 gloating look on his face, it is almost as if he wants them to attack and =
keep the battle going.

Meanwhile Phobia and several sweeps keep an eye on =
things from the air, while Terrorsaur and Waspinator landed, ready to help =
out as needed.

At the same time Legacy processed Tuscon=92s command for hi=
m to leave the Ark. There was a long pause, and then the temporal guardian=
=92s cold voice comes across the channel, =93I will not comply with your co=
mmand. I have been tasked with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<

Deepstryke transmits =
to Hydras, =93Hydras. I am picking up an encrypted transmissions to and fro=
m Tuscon, he is attempting to communicate with the others. I am generating =
a radio dampening field now in this area. Only the Predacons will be able t=
o transmit.=94


Meanwhile inside the Black Tower:

Windlord=92s attempt to=
 open fire on the Scourge was met with a measure of futility. Scourge just =
stepped away from the opening that Windlord fired out from and let the shot=
s go harmlessly into a bulkhead, scorching it only slightly.

However that =
slight amount of time allowed Windlord and Rat Trap time to scurry further =
into their crawl space and find an interior bulkhead to hide behind.

=93Sc=
rap!=94 Scourge=92s voice said from the outside. There was a pause and then=
, =93Cyclonus, they have fled into the walls.=94

There was another pause, =
and then Scourge chuckled, =93Of course. I will be ready for them.=94

From=
 further inside the crawl space the sounds of chittering could be heard, an=
d then several groups of optics could be seen in the distance coming toward=
s Rat Trap and Windlord. In the darkness their shapes could only be barely =
made out, but they looked like black metallic spiders, Hydras=92 wall guard=
ians!

(OOC: Rat Trap may recognize them from last time. Also keep in mind =
that Rat Trap and Windlord should be in beast mode. They would have to be t=
o fit inside the crawl space. In the toon the Beast Modes did not have offe=
nsive weaponry, except for teeth and claws)

Outside the Ark:

Rodimus was =
positioned in a small grove of trees, ducking down behind several large roc=
ks. He gives Quickstride a quizzical look as the equine Maximal sniffed him=
.

(OOC: Quickstride=92s sniff reveals nothing wrong.)

He was about to let=
 Quickstride in on what he had planned when Uproar appeared. Rodimus appear=
s taken aback though by Uproar=92s conclusion that it was Legacy that had t=
urned evil. While Rodimus didn=92t know that much about Legacy, having only=
 seen him briefly while being rescued and repaired, there was nothing to hi=
nt that this attack was Legacy=92s doing. He was about to say something whe=
n Uproar ran towards the Ark to be let in . . .

>KRACK POW<  

As Uproar r=
an towards the Ark, what seemed like a round bolt of lightening appeared, s=
ending Uproar flying several yards through the air, to land heavily on the =
ground! Evidently the Ark shielding was still in place, and it was not allo=
wing anyone in.

Rodimus frowned, =93Uproar! Get over here! If we are going=
 to get back in, then we need to work together. That shield is supposed to =
hold off all the Predacon forces. We are not going to get in by brute force=
.=94

As Rodimus talked three other Maximals seemed to almost materialize o=
ut of the underbrush, such was their skills at camouflage.

The first was W=
ing Caliber, (See: http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Skywarp ) an old Maximal stratagi=
st and military teacher, who from the brownish feathers along his frame tur=
ned into some sort of eagle.  

The next was Leo II, (http://en.academic.ru=
/pictures/enwiki/76/Lioconvoy_gathering.jpg ) the adopted son of Lio Convoy=
, and who looked much like him, and who had obviously picked up many of his=
 mannerisms. His body was powerfully built and heavily armored. He looked t=
o turn into a lion.  

The third was Ramulus (http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Ramulu=
s) who had like the others been on patrol for a while, surveying the area a=
nd trying to keep it free from Predacon invasion.

They also come up beside=
 Rodimus, Leo II, obviously the leader of the other two, =93What now sir?=
=94

Rodimus looked at Quickstride and Uproar, =93Well let=92s get out of s=
ight, and then we can discuss it.=94

Meanwhile Inside the Ark:

Perceptor =
had received Tuscon=92s message and sent attempted to send a message to Lor=
d elder, however at the moment there was no answer from the elder Maximal.
=

At the same time Legacy was still standing in the med lab along with the o=
thers, his single optic glowing in the darkness.

=93It would seem that Nig=
htlight=92s vital systems are being held at minimal levels.=94 Legacy said =
as he directed his gaze to the wall panel nearest Nightlight. A small light=
 blinked, indicating her spark was still online, but that there was not eno=
ugh power to reboot her systems.

He turned to look at the others, his face=
 glowing in the darkness, lit by his own optic, and the glowing bar on his =
chest plate. He raised his right hand in the air, the one with the arm cann=
on on it and begin to emit light from it, much like a flash light or a beac=
on so that the room was illuminated. He casually looked around, =93Perhaps =
we could locate a back out or reserve power system . . . =93

Legacy paused=
 as Tuscon=92s message came in. He turned to look at Santon, Bump and Perce=
ptor, a look of disbelief momentarily flashing across his face.

Legacy str=
aightened as his cold voice comes across the channel, =93I will not comply =
with your command. I have been tasked with  . . . . >*BZZZTT!*<  . . . the =
protection of the Ark as well as that of the Matrix. I will not knowingly l=
eave the Ark undefended or the Matrix in the hands of another.=94

Legacy t=
urned to look at his console as he understoodf what happened. Communication=
s had been cut part way through his message. He turned to look at the other=
s, his single optic cold, =93It is illogical to believe that I would attemp=
t to harm the Ark or allow anyone to take it from the Maximals.=94

(TAG)

=
Preston
